name: Seven Seas Solitaire
description: Show off your solitaire skills as you sail the seven seas to rescue your darling Elaine. Take command of The Falcon and explore over 300 levels, firing cannonballs and matching cards from your choice of beautiful decks as you plunge yourself into the adventure.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: any DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: any
